item.title: OpenStack-Ansible networking on CentOS 7 with systemd-networkd
item.description: Although OpenStack-Ansible doesn’t fully support CentOS 7 yet, the support is almost ready. I have a four node Ocata cloud deployed on CentOS 7, but I decided to change things around a bit and use systemd-networkd instead of NetworkManager or the old rc scripts. This post will explain how to configure the network for an OpenStack-Ansible cloud on CentOS 7 with systemd-networkd.
